amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate the $600 million in funding for Amtrak's capital and debt service grants and to apply the savings to the Spending Reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds in the Capital Debt Service Grants to the National Railroad Passenger Corporation by $600,000,000 and increase funds in the Spending Reduction account by $600,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A012) Failed by voice vote.
